an7.25:1: "Bhikkhus, I will teach you seven principles of non-decline. Listen and attend closely. I will speak."
an7.25:2: () As long as they have a sense of moral shame … (3) … have moral dread … (4) … are learned … (5) … are energetic … (6) … are mindful … (7) … are wise, only growth is to be expected for them, not decline.
an7.25:3: "Bhikkhus, as long as these seven principles of non-decline continue among the bhikkhus, and the bhikkhus are seenestablishedin them, only growth is to be expected for them, not decline."
